channel.title: Comments on: Contact Legislators to Support OSU-Cascades Innovation Center Funding

item.title: By: Max
item.dc:creator: Max
item.description: I agree with John, the west side location is terrible and I am really surprised the likes of edco and bend tech can't see through the propaganda. Although since most of you just moved here from bigger urban sprawl I guess it's only natural for you to want to turn Bend into what you moved away from.
item.content:encoded: I agree with John, the west side location is terrible and I am really surprised the likes of edco and bend tech can’t see through the propaganda. Although since most of you just moved here from bigger urban sprawl I guess it’s only natural for you to want to turn Bend into what you moved away from.

item.title: By: John Sherry
item.dc:creator: John Sherry
item.description: There is not "strong support" for the Westside location. There is support for the college. Period.
item.content:encoded: There is not “strong support” for the Westside location. There is support for the college. Period.
